Omega
  • Welcome to Omega Documentation
  • View page source

Welcome to Omega Documentation

Omega is a comprehensive project that integrates AI capabilities, gaming, camera systems, and more into a unified environment.

Main Features

  • AI Integration - Advanced AI components for automation and analysis

  • Entertainment System - RetroArch game integration with controller support

  • Camera Management - Integration with Foil Coach and baby monitor feeds

  • Cross-Device Connectivity - Seamless integration across multiple devices

  • Cloud Storage Organization - Structured file management across platforms

Quick Start

# Clone the repository
git clone https://github.com/louis-etiennedrouin/omega.git

# Navigate to the code directory
cd omega

# Install dependencies
pip install -r requirements.txt

# Run the main application
python omega_main.py
